astrid-oster-mortensen-9th-april-2023.title: The Piano Behind The Curtain w/ Astrid Øster Mortensen

description: This show is a love letter for a friend far away, but also a love letter for my Sundays. It is for the sad ones, the lazy ones, the inspired ones and the lovely frustrated ones. I will be broadcasting from the piano behind the curtain on the empty theatre stage in the basement of the local cinema inside my mind.
title: The Piano Behind The Curtain w/ Astrid Øster Mortensen
